ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: SOCY 658 will expose you to qualitative research design and augment your ability to conduct a wide arrange of qualitative research. For those reasons, I would highly recommend this course.
Great introduction to qualitative methods and to writing for sociology journals.

I would recommend this course to a fellow student. I think the course, particularly the assignments, is much more beneficial to students who have already started research projects, as it's a great place to really "workshop" a research project.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course expanded my knowledge base for qualitative research design and critical debates within the discipline of sociology. Furthermore, I feel much more prepared to conducting research and writing articles to be published in top-tier, sociology journals. This course will assist me greatly in my dissertation and research as it has provided me with even more tools to engage in my qualitative research.

I thought this course exposed me to some foundational works in terms of qualitative research, as well as provided me with practical tips on how to conduct qualitative research. Working through my research project during this course also helped me to better understand where I'd like to go with my research.
